answers.answer: Yeah its completely normal...happens to me to!
Is There Anyway To Keep It From Happening So Often.? I Don't Want It To Happen While Im Out & I Just Fall Out Or Something.
Just get up slower than a snail and keep healthy. Happens to me all the time. Stopping when i get lightheaded also helps.
I always got like that , found out I was preeclampsia thursday

question: Its Seems Like Everytime I Get Up & Start Walking To Do Something I Get Real Light Headed. Is This Normal? At First It Didn't Happen As Often Now It Happens Everytime.
title: light headedness
